text: People start to notice that even though you have been president for a while, America is still not 'great again'.

choices.text: I'm not a miracle worker! In fact, I am not even part of the working class.
Give an encouraging speech to the public on how you know many people who do think that America is great again.

text: Your advisor mentions that bringing Apple's production back is a good way to create jobs. How are you going to convince Tim Cook?

choices.text: Who's Tim Cook? Isn't Steve Jobs running that place?
Plant some money, and hope a factory will grow there.
Give Jim Took a seat on some advisory board.
